author: Simon Difford
description: Normally we'd follow convention and honour the Martini name with a V-shaped glass. However, due to the splash of champagne, a coupe seems more in keeping for this dangerous champagne charged riff on a Fifty-Fifty Dry Martini
name: Millionaire's Martini
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
